short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pays homage to the one True American, Donald J. Trump.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Who doesn't love Donald Trump? According to polls, most people. But don't let that deter you! Show your love for Trump with this neat extension that gives you a glimpse of the true Trump every time you see him on the Internet!

Let's make America Great again!
